eng: Playing in a group, being a member of a music team

eng: We had enough money for food and clothes, but to buy a refrigerator

eng: We could have bought a car without any problems, but a house

eng: We didn't have any financial problems, we even bought a new house, aha

eng: Money did not always reach the family, even for food
